function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited implementation of occupant health concepts in building design and construction","Impact":"Increased risk of health problems related to indoor environments","Mitigation":"Cultivating interest and awareness of healthy building concepts among building practitioners","Technologies":"Educational programs, workshops, and training sessions on healthy building design and construction","People":"Building practitioners, including designers, engineers, constructors, facility managers","Owner":"Building industry stakeholders, educational institutions, and health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of integration of human health knowledge into building design and operation","Impact":"Failure to address health-related concerns in building design and operation","Mitigation":"Consulting health professionals to incorporate their knowledge about human health into building design and operation","Technologies":"Collaborative platforms for health and building professionals, interdisciplinary workshops and conferences","People":"Building practitioners, health professionals, data/computer scientists","Owner":"Building industry stakeholders, health organizations, and interdisciplinary research institutions"},{"Description":"Data-related challenges for delivering buildings that support and promote occupant health","Impact":"Inability to optimize building design and operation for occupant health","Mitigation":"Consulting data/computer scientists to understand and address data-related challenges in healthy building design and operation","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, building performance simulation software, IoT sensors for data collection","People":"Building practitioners, data/computer scientists, researchers","Owner":"Building industry stakeholders, technology companies, and research institutions"}]}
